sentences.english: The right of privacy embodies the dignity and the value of human being.
sentences.chinese: 隐私权作为人格权的一种，体现了人的尊严和价值。

sentences.english: The right of privacies of any member will be subjected to to the origin tight protection for stand.
sentences.chinese: 任何会员的隐私权都将受到本站的严密保护。

sentences.english: Privacy is one good example of individual rights.
sentences.chinese: 隐私权就是说明个人权利的一个很好的例子。

sentences.english: Your privacy on the Internet is of utmost importance to the World Health Organization (WHO).
sentences.chinese: 你在因特网上的隐私权对世界卫生组织是至关重要的。

sentences.english: Privacy regulations could be an obstacle.
sentences.chinese: 隐私权法规可能是个障碍。

sentences.english: Wang Fei violates back mitzvah to counterpoise to do not enjoy privacy with respect to its.
sentences.chinese: 王菲就其违法背德行为不享有隐私权。

sentences.english: They have violated the privacy of citizens who engage in non-violent political speech.
sentences.chinese: 他们侵犯了那些发表非暴力政治言论的人的隐私权。

sentences.english: This is an important feature granting privacy even in machine theft case.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个重要特征，即使给予隐私权机盗窃案。

sentences.english: One area central to the privacy debate is opt-in versus opt-out.
sentences.chinese: 一区中央对隐私权的辩论是选择式银两选择退出。

sentences.english: It says the subpena for the information violates it's users' privacy rights.
sentences.chinese: 他们声称传票索要的信息侵犯了使用者的隐私权。

sentences.english: Secretive interview tends to cause legal dispute, especially the privacy.
sentences.chinese: 隐性采访极易引起纠纷，其中以隐私权为最。

sentences.english: The San Mateo County Library values you as a customer and takes your personal privacy seriously.
sentences.chinese: 圣马刁县立图书馆重视您个人的隐私权。

sentences.english: Do corporations have personal privacy rights?
sentences.chinese: 公司享有个人的隐私权吗？

sentences.english: The right of privacy of the thing compares the people in general's right of privacies to all have the dissimilarity.
sentences.chinese: 物的隐私权比一般民众的隐私权都有所不同。

sentences.english: The right of privacy of the thing compares the people in general's right of privacies to all have the dissimilarity.
sentences.chinese: 物的隐私权比一般民众的隐私权都有所不同。

sentences.english: Understand the true meaning and legislations of privacy.
sentences.chinese: 能了解隐私权的内涵与法律规范。

definition: to infringe on/to encroach on/to violate/to assault
right (i.e. an entitlement to sth)/(classical) power and wealth
